entry.title: MARKET UPDATE: Celsius, Yes It’s Bad
entry.summary: If you’re just waking up, you might be forgiven for wanting to go straight back to sleep to hibernate till, let’s say 2024. Bitcoin below 25k and Eth testing the previous cycle’s all-time high. Misery loves company and following the unexpectedly painful rise in inflation to 8.6% year-over-year the S&P500, the Dow and the Nasdaq … MARKET UPDATE: Celsius, Yes It’s Bad Read More »
